participant_1.background:
I take time to enjoy nature and spend time with my mother.
I'd brag about my loyal friends who have stuck with me through thick and thin.
I love to show my friends the sunflowers I grow.
I'm doing my best to be a good role model for my daughter, and I hope she's learning a lot at school.
i would travel the world if i could.

participant_2.background:
I rely on public transportation because my eyes are too weak to drive.
I'm not always graceful, but my kids find it hilarious when I trip over my own feet.
i work for a magazine.
My favorite thing to do is read, but I would be unable to do it if I were blind.
I love sharing stories of my adventures with my family and friends over a home-cooked meal.

content.text: hello! I'm glad to meet you.
Hello, nice to meet you too!
What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to read, share stories with my friends and family, and go on adventures.
That sounds wonderful! I love to go on adventures too. What is your favorite adventure you've ever had?
I went on a trip to Europe with my family when I was younger, and it was amazing. We got to see so many different countries and cultures. It was an incredible experience.
That sounds like an amazing experience! I would love to go to Europe someday.
You should! It's a beautiful place with so much to offer.
What else do you enjoy doing?
I love to spend time with my family and friends, go for walks in nature, and grow sunflowers.
I love sunflowers! They're so beautiful.
Me too! I love watching them grow and seeing the beautiful flowers bloom.
It sounds like we have a lot in common.
I think so too! It's nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
Yes, it is! I'm glad we met.
